official_title: To provide for a study to determine the extent to which health professions schools provide adequate education to students on women's health conditions.
short_title: Equity in Health Professions Education Act

summary.text: Equity in Health Professions Education Act - Directs the Secretary of Health and Human Services to conduct a study to determine the extent to which health professions schools provide adequate education to students on women's health conditions. Requires priority in the study to be given to schools of medicine and osteopathic medicine. Requires a report to specified congressional committees by April 1, 1995.

titles.title: Equity in Health Professions Education Act
To provide for a study to determine the extent to which health professions schools provide adequate education to students on women's health conditions.
